statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 14 , -4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 6 , -15 \, x^{3} - 20 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 18 , 15 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 18 , -5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
